issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

assignee.name: myrna
assignee.emailAddress: m dot v dot lunteren at gmail dot com

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I found unit/fillLog.unit is failed when program was build as sane.

I found exception was recorded in derby.log as next.

author.name: tsuresh
author.emailAddress: suresh dot thalamati at gmail dot com

comments.body:
After bit of search , found this test is failing after the following change to the code line. 

r407642 | fuzzylogic | 2006-05-18 14:56:36 -0700 (Thu, 18 May 2006) | 4 lines

DERBY-892: Allow for test-specific additions to the derby_tests.policy file.

Committed for Myrna Van Lunteren <m.v.lunteren@gmail.com>

------------------------------------------------------------------------


Thanks
-suresh

updateAuthor.name: tsuresh
updateAuthor.emailAddress: suresh dot thalamati at gmail dot com

author.name: myrna
author.emailAddress: m dot v dot lunteren at gmail dot com

comments.body: Attaching a patch - DERBY-1346_20060527.* - that adds a fillLog.policy file so thit test will pass again.

updateAuthor.name: myrna
updateAuthor.emailAddress: m dot v dot lunteren at gmail dot com
